alert.note: Alert for George; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 6:32PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern George and southeastern Stone Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 631 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Lucedale, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern George and southeastern Stone Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
